original_text: And when there arose a great dissension, the chief captain, fearing lest Paul should have been pulled in pieces of them, commanded the soldiers to go down, and to take him by force from among them, and to bring him into the castle.
korean_text: 큰 분쟁이 생기니 천부장은 바울이 그들에게 찢겨질까 하여 군인을 명하여 내려가 무리 가운데서 빼앗아 가지고 영내로 들어가라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And when there arose a great dissension
fearing lest Paul should have been pulled in pieces of them
commanded the soldiers to go down
and to take him by force from among them
and to bring him into the castle
